Module restaurant_system
Package main

Class SalesReportApp

java.lang.Object
main.AggregatePrint
main.SalesReportApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
RW
public class SalesReportApp extends AggregatePrint implements RW
Represents the Sales Report App class that is responsible for 1) Receiving the order invoices 2) Allowing the user to choose the time period for the reservation 3) GROUPING THE SALE ITEMS WITH QUANTITY 4) Printing it in the Order Invoice format. It is a concrete class that inherits from the AggregatePrint abstract class.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bryan

      public void process()
      Method to process a Sales Report. This is done by 1) Prompting the user which time period they want 2) Calling the appropriate overloaded processReport method
